db:abstract.db:para: Adds the Windows App SDK library to the application.

db:article.db:para: Adds the Windows App SDK library to the application.
This command was introduced in Qt 6.9.

db:note.db:para: This command is in technology preview and may change in future releases.

db:section.db:title: Synopsis
db:section.db:para: If versionless commands are disabled, use qt6_add_win_app_sdk() instead. It supports the same set of arguments as this command.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: Adds Windows App SDK include files to the project, and links the necessary libraries to the given CMake target. Windows App SDK is provided as a NuGet package so it can be easily used in managed apps. However, for unmanaged C++ applications we need header files. The function takes the following steps:

db:listitem.db:para: Tries to find the Windows App SDK and cppwinrt.exe tool
Generates Windows App SDK headers using the cppwinrt.exe tool
Includes those header files and links the library to the given CMake target

db:warning.db:para: This command is not supported on non-MSVC platforms.
